name: iterall
description: Minimal zero-dependency utilities for using JavaScript Iterables in all environments.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run testonly && npm run testdocs
scripts.testdocs: if [ "$(documentation readme -dgs API | grep -vF 'up to date')" ]; then echo 'Must run: npm run docs'; exit 1; fi;
scripts.travis: npm run lint-check && npm run flow && npm run testdocs && npm run testonly && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Lee Byron <lee@leebyron.com> (http://leebyron.com/)
